original: @80b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @80b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aarya manydzu shr'i bha n'a ra ka k'a ru na sto tra /
analyzed: aarya manydzu shr'i bha n'a ra ka k'a ru na sto tra /
translated: Arya-Manjusri-bhanara-karuna-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa //
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa //
translated: Praise to the Compassion of the Noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing //
analyzed: nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing //
translated: Having completely eliminated all faults,

original: thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab //
analyzed: thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab //
translated: The Sage's fame pervades all beings without exception.

original: dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba //
analyzed: dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba //
translated: Possessing a glorious and very stable body,

original: dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩbos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa //
analyzed: dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo // bos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa //
translated: I constantly pay homage to you, glorious one.üîΩHaving been called, you protect all beings

original: phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad //
analyzed: phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad //
translated: From all these misfortunes without exception.

original: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces //
analyzed: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces //
translated: Even though I am suffering, I say this to you:

original: ci yi phyir na ngos par sel mi mdzad //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na ngos par sel mi mdzad //
translated: Why do you not remove my distress?

original: bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la //
analyzed: bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la //
translated: Blessed One, if it is true that you always

original: rnam pa kun du thams cad gsol grag na //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du thams cad gsol grag na //
translated: Pray for everything for everyone in every way,

original: bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas //
analyzed: bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas //
translated: Then why do you not grant me even a mere glimpse?

original: de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags //üîΩyon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa //
analyzed: de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags // yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa //
translated: Therefore, I am of very low fortune.üîΩYou are endowed with good qualities and remove faults,

original: blo bzang 'gro @81a * //
analyzed: blo bzang 'gro @81a * //
translated: You are wise,

original: kun skyob par brtson gyur na //
analyzed: kun skyob par brtson gyur na //
translated: and strive to protect all beings.

original: bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang //
analyzed: bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang //
translated: Even though my mind is devoted to you,

original: phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur //
analyzed: phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur //
translated: why am I tormented by poverty?

original: thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni //
translated: You, who possess the nature of compassion,

original: pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i spyan gnyis kyis //
analyzed: pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i spyan gnyis kyis //
translated: with your two eyes, pure like lotuses,

original: 'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par //
analyzed: 'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par //
translated: though you benefit beings,

original: ma gzigs pa ni kyee ma sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: ma gzigs pa ni kyee ma sdug bsngal lo //
translated: not seeing my suffering, alas, is painful.

original: khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi //
translated: You, who comfort the frightened mind,

original: phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag rkyong yang //
analyzed: phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag rkyong yang //
translated: though you always extend your lotus hands far,

original: skal nyes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni //
analyzed: skal nyes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni //
translated: due to the heat of my bad fortune,

original: thag ring du ni mi snang nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: thag ring du ni mi snang nyid du 'gyur //
translated: they do not appear even from afar.üîΩThough your two ears are unimpaired and pure,

original: khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag / gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis //
analyzed: khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag / gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis //
translated: my body is afflicted with suffering.

original: gzir te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod gyur kyang //
analyzed: gzir te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod gyur kyang //
translated: Even though I cry out in your presence,

original: bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur //
analyzed: bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur //
translated: Why do you not hear my lowly voice?

original: rnam pa kun du thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis //
translated: You, who are always compassionate,

original: dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na //üîΩsdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni //
analyzed: dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na // sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni //
translated: Who bring happiness to those in the hells,üîΩThe Blessed One has no compassion

original: thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' gyur //
analyzed: thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' gyur //
translated: For me, the sinful one.

original: 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi //
translated: You, who benefit the lowly in the world,

original: khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na //
analyzed: khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na //
translated: Who have this youthful play,

original: gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang //
analyzed: gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang //
translated: Though I am oppressed by suffering here,

original: bskyab par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes //
analyzed: bskyab par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes //
translated: I am not protected, sinful one, because of my thoughts.

original: 'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes //
analyzed: 'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúWho is suffering here?‚Äù

original: glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces //
analyzed: glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces //
translated: ‚ÄúWho is the fool by whom perfection is destroyed?‚Äù

original: de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang //
translated: Thus, wandering about, you protect,

original: bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che //
translated: But you do not see my distress. Alas, how amazing!

original: gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la //
analyzed: gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la //
translated: To whom will you give your words?

original: 'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes //
analyzed: 'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes //
translated: And immediately give the most perfect of gifts.

original: de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis //
analyzed: de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis //
translated: Thus, with your wisdom, you strive

original: ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad //
translated: To protect me.

original: khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde //
analyzed: khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde //
translated: Who would not be happy to have faith in you?

original: khyed dang bsod nams dman pa zhig ma mchis //
analyzed: khyed dang bsod nams dman pa zhig ma mchis //
translated: There is no one who is not inferior in merit to you.

original: bdag ni khyed la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar //
analyzed: bdag ni khyed la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar //
translated: But even though I have faith in you, I am suffering.

original: ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs //
analyzed: ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs //
translated: Why is this? I am filled with wonder.

original: sdug bsngal gcod mdzad sman pa chen po ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gcod mdzad sman pa chen po ni //
translated: You are the great doctor who cuts away suffering.

original: gang de khyed kyang bdag la spong mdzad na //
analyzed: gang de khyed kyang bdag la spong mdzad na //
translated: But you abandon me.

original: bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan su la //
analyzed: bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan su la //
translated: Who else, whose merit is destroyed,

original: skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs ;üîΩ/'gro la rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi //
analyzed: skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs ; /'gro la rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi //
translated: Should I go to for refuge?üîΩYou have a mind of love for beings,

original: brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol spyod pa //
analyzed: brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol spyod pa //
translated: Always like a mother for her only child.

original: khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na //
analyzed: khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na //
translated: If you do not remove my suffering,

original: de tshe bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags //
analyzed: de tshe bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags //
translated: Then I am destroyed, without a protector.

original: bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: Blessed One, merely to remember you

original: 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na //
analyzed: 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na //
translated: You bestow on beings the incomparable fruit of all your actions,

original: bdag ni @81b bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs //
analyzed: bdag ni @81b bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs //
translated: And yet I am still on my own side,

original: rnam pa kun du phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad //üîΩde ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yon tan //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad // de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yon tan //
translated: Procrastinating in every way.üîΩBy this petition, I have accumulated merit

original: cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge bsags pa //
analyzed: cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge bsags pa //
translated: Through the mere expression of your qualities.üîΩBy this, may beings‚Äô merit

original: gang yin des ni 'gro la bsod nams dag / rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang //
analyzed: gang yin des ni 'gro la bsod nams dag / rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang //
translated: Become vast, like the excellent vase that grants all wishes.

original: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs sku yi //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs sku yi //
translated: Like the wish-fulfilling gem,

original: zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi //
translated: Your two feet, which move like a wish-fulfilling tree,

original: khyod kyi gzhon nu'i lus su bdag gyur cing //
analyzed: khyod kyi gzhon nu'i lus su bdag gyur cing //
translated: May I be born in your youthful bodyüîΩAnd be your master in all my lives.

original: skye ba kun du bdag po nyid gyur cig / rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: skye ba kun du bdag po nyid gyur cig / rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the praise of the compassion of the noble Ma√±jughosha composed by the master noble Nagarjuna.
